title: Womens Dress Short Sleeve
title_original: PRETTYGARDEN Women's Casual Summer Midi Dress Puffy Short Sleeve Square Neck Smocked Tiered Ruffle Dresses

reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress stylish with a feminine look and high-end appearance, comfortable, and flattering, with one customer noting it works well for curvy bodies. The color receives positive feedback, particularly the bright red version, and customers describe the fabric as high quality, though some find it feels cheap for the price. Customers disagree on the sizing, with some finding it runs slightly large, while the fit receives mixed reviews with some noting it's very fitted to the midsection. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Dress for Baby Announcements!
items.body: I wore this elegant green dress for our baby announcement, and I couldn't be happier with my choice! The color is absolutely stunning — it got so many compliments! It's a rich, vibrant green that stands out beautifully without being overwhelming, making it perfect for a special occasion like ours. The dress fits perfectly and is flattering, with a nice flow to it that makes it feel both comfortable and sophisticated. I felt confident and stylish, and the compliments kept coming throughout the day! If you're looking for a dress that's both elegant and eye-catching, I highly recommend this one. It definitely made our announcement even more memorable! Read more
items.author: JustSharingMyToughts

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Surprisingly great!
items.body: I was so pleasantly surprised by this dress! The fabric feels lightweight but not flimsy, and the smocked top makes it really comfortable and flattering without being tight. The square neckline and puff sleeves give it such a sweet, feminine look, and I love that it’s easy to dress up with heels or down with sandals. The tiered skirt has a nice flow to it. Definitely one of those dresses you just feel good in. I’ve already gotten a few compliments wearing it, and I know I’ll be reaching for it all season. Read more
items.author: Tiffany Garno

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful but not the best quality
items.body: This is a very Beautiful, Comfortable and Stylish dress. The puffy sleeve makes the dress look high fashion. The fabric is soft and comfortable. I get a lot of compliments on this dress. The one bad thing about this dress is that after I washed it the first time the elastic on my shoulder fell apart. I had to spend $20 getting it repaired. Read more
items.author: Penny Liu

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dress!
items.body: Gorgeous color! Great fit. I am 5’6 150lbs and the size small fits perfectly. It arrived not very wrinkled at all and stayed that way. It does not have pockets. Very stretchy and smooth fabric. Washed fine, I never put my dresses through the dryer, always hang to dry and it did fine. I ordered it in the dark green color it is not see through at all. Perfect for our holiday photos! Read more
items.author: Sarah Schweik

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Loose fitting and already stretchy in the bust
items.body: Runs large!! I always struggle with my best fitting in dresses, but this was actually pretty loose in the bust area so I definitely am gonna size down when I order it again but it’s beautiful when I used it for Halloween to be Wendy Read more
items.author: Alyssa

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress, unfortunately too big for me
items.body: I ordered this dress since I needed an humble and summery dress for various occasions. The quality is really good, it came with almost no wrinkles which is pretty rare when ordering clothes, regarding comfort the material is really soft on the skin. The only con is the size. I’m usually an XS or S but the brand offered only S as the smallest size. Well it is much more an M than an S. Be careful when ordering, I recommend sizing down. Read more
items.author: Real Life Reviews

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Curve approved!
items.body: So pretty and flattering! Best in a dark color. The lighter color shows the cheapness but in black and dark blue it’s perfect and you can dress it up nicely! Read more
items.author: Rose Iannuzzi

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice dress
items.body: Super cute!! Loved the color! It was crazy wrinkled when it arrived and took a while to steam all of the wrinkles out. But once I did, it was great and didn’t wrinkle super easily afterwards while wearing. Not see through, not clingy, decent material. Wish it had pockets, that would make it perfect. I would get other colors. Read more
items.author: Isabella

short_description:
Womens Dress Short Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.
about_this_item:
Womens Dress Short Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.
long_description:
Womens Dress Short Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Floral Red, Blue, Floral Blue, Army Green, Black, Orange, Dark Rose Red, Dark Green, Light Blue, Red, Floral Rose Red, Pink, White, Yellow. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.
